ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Carnal pauldrons
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually in Lavastorm at 17? A few yellows Some whites/blues TONS of greens I don t recall ever seeing ANY Reds in lavastorm after level 16 or so. ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Actually in Lavastorm at 17?

A few yellows
Some whites/blues
TONS of greens

I don't recall ever seeing ANY Reds in lavastorm after level 16 or so.

----- Original Message -----
From: "Bill Costlow" <atlatyl@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 20, 2000 3:22 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Carnal pauldrons


>
> --- Scott Malin <Thanos0000@...> wrote:
>
> Hmmm ...
> > hows the hunting in Lavastorm for a level 17 bard?
>
> Poor, I think. 12-15 outside Nagena is pretty good,
> but beyond that, I think you'll be seeing many reds,
> many greens and little in between.
>
